#summary Console command: browse cluster
#labels console

= Browse cluster =

This command display all the records of a cluster.

== Syntax ==

{{{browse cluster <cluster-name>}}}

Where:

 * cluster-name   The name of the cluster

== Example ==

{{{
> browse cluster City

---+--------+-------------------
  #| REC ID |NAME
---+--------+-------------------
  0|    -6:0|Rome
  1|    -6:1|London
  2|    -6:2|Honolulu
---+--------+-------------------
}}}

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
